org.json.write

Class SimpleStructureWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.json.write.SimpleStructureWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StructureIdentifier, StructureWriter

    public final class SimpleStructureWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements StructureWriter
    Initial structure writer for when a JSONWriter is only writing a simple value.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SimpleStructureWriter INSTANCE
      The singleton instance.

      • endStructure

        public boolean endStructure(java.lang.Appendable writer)
                     throws JSONException
        Throws a JSONException to indicate this writer can't write an end structure.
        Specified by:
        endStructure in interface StructureWriter
        Parameters:
        writer - the Appendable to write any end structure content
        Returns:
        true to indicate JSON writing has been completed, and no more content may be written, otherwise false to indicate more JSON data may be written
        Throws:
        JSONException - no end structure can be written by this writer
